thread.title: K & J Churchville, VA
thread.title_full: Grand Home Furnishings reviewed by K & J Churchville, VA

author: K & J Churchville, VA
title: K & J Churchville, VA
text:
The sales staff was very helpful by listening to what we wanted for our new home. We "custom ordered" our living furniture and it was delivered in 6 weeks versus what we thought was going to be 8 weeks!
The delivery personnel were excellent! They made sure our furniture was perfect and showed respect for our home by placing additional padding on the walls and floors.
We even received a thank you note from our salesperson for the purchase!
Grand Home Furnishings exceeded our expectations from the beginning to the end of the buying process!
Thank you,
